item.title: Being on Offense When it Comes to Day to Day Scheduling
item.description: How do we go on the “offensive” leaving behind what has only become a “defensive” effort to save our day from becoming unproductive?Â Leaving us at the end of the day feeling like we need to make up some time after work or the weekend This post will be a look at how to manage your time in the midst of what can seem to be endless distractions and too many things needing to be done at once.
